plot: A retelling of the Disney film, 'Mulan (1998)', using animated clips and songs from the film, but this version was staged on ice.
title: Reflections on Ice: Michelle Kwan Skates to the Music of Disney's 'Mulan'
plot_es: A retelling of the Disney film, 'Mulan (1998)', using animated clips and songs from the film, but this version was staged on ice.
original_name: Reflections on Ice: Michelle Kwan Skates to the Music of Disney's 'Mulan'
